name: Lanard & Axilbund, Inc. v. Knopman, Appellant

parties: Lanard & Axilbund, Inc. v. Knopman, Appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
Lanard & Axilbund, Inc. v. Knopman, Appellant.
Argued January 10, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Jaclc Brian, with him Richard, Brian & DiSanti, for appellant.
Allen J. Levin, with him Goodis, Greenfield, Narin and Mann, for appellee.
March 15, 1968:
